EmailTemplate.name: MiamiRE (RAMB) Introduction
EmailTemplate.subject: IDX Introduction - MiamiRE - {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Nice to e-meet you! My name is [Coordinator Name], and I am the IDX Coordinator at Luxury Presence! I will be responsible for the IDX search tool setup process on your new website.
In order for us to display IDX data on your website, RAMB - Miami Association of RealtorsÂ® requires the agent to request the data access agreement on Bridge Interactive. Here is the instruction sheet to help you step by step with this process:{{ if custom.documentexists_4492460 }}Instructions{{ end }}.
Please submit the request at your earliest convenience.
Please let me know if you have any questions!
{{ if custom.documentexists_4492460 }} FL_RAMB - Miami Association of REALTORS - IDX Request Form_Instructions.pdf FL_RAMB - Miami Association of REALTORS - IDX Request Form_Instructions.pdf {{ custom.documentlink_id_4492460_skipform_true }} {{ end }}
Best Regards,
